QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Stereotactic radiosurgery - CyberKnife
QAPair.Answer: Stereotactic radiosurgery (SRS) is a form of radiation therapy that focuses high-power energy on a small area of the body. Despite its name, radiosurgery is a treatment, not a surgical procedure. Incisions (cuts) are not made on your body. More than one type of machine and system can be used to perform radiosurgery. This article is about radiosurgery using the system called CyberKnife.
